attributes.additional_details:
There are many vile pages on facebook. One of the biggest offenders is the EDL. These pages contain many racist and offensive posts with a high number of threats of violence to boot. These posts should not be tolerated on such a popular website as there are disgusting.
A added note is that many of these posts are prejudical and presume guilt of people before they are found guilty.
Remove that too.

rejection.details: There are already laws against hate crime on the internet, but the Government is always monitoring the situation.
